links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 481
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,0,-1).
prog: (Python)TOP = 33a = [1]*TOPa[2]=4for n in range(3,TOP):    print a[n-3],    a[n] = 3*a[n-1] - a[n-3]# from _Alex Ratushnyak_, Aug 10 2012
